verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, neither be thou dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with thee, and arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%>: see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into thy hand <S%H3027><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and his people <S%H5971><s%>, and his city <S%H5892><s%>, and his land <S%H776><s%>:

And thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%> as thou didst <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Yericho <S%H3405><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%>: only the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof, and the cattle <S%H929><s%> thereof, shall ye take for a prey <S%H962><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto yourselves: lay <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee an ambush <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for the city <S%H5892><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> it.

So Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, to go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> against Ai <S%H5857><s%>: and Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> chose out <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, and sent them away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, ye shall lie in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%>, even behind <S%H310><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>: go <S%H7368><s%> not very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>, but be ye all ready <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%>:

And I, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that are with me, will approach <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the city <S%H5892><s%>: and it shall come to pass, when they come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> us, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>, that we will flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them,

(For they will come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> us) till we have drawn <S%H5423><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them from the city <S%H5892><s%>; for they will say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, They flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8801><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>: therefore we will flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

Then ye shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the ambush <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and seize <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon the city <S%H5892><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it into your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And it shall be, when ye have taken <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, that ye shall set <S%H3341><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%>: according to the Mitzvah <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you.

Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> therefore sent them forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and they went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to lie in ambush <S%H3993><s%>, and abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> between Beit-El <S%H1008><s%> and Ai <S%H5857><s%>, on the west side <S%H3220><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>: but Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%>, even the people of war <S%H4421><s%> that were with him, went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and drew nigh <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before the city <S%H5892><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>: now there was a valley <S%H1516><s%> between them and Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> about five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them to lie in ambush <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> between Beit-El <S%H1008><s%> and Ai <S%H5857><s%>, on the west side <S%H3220><s%> of the city <S%H5857><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5892><s%>.

And when they had set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, even all the host <S%H4264><s%> that was on the north <S%H6828><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and their liers in wait <S%H6119><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, that they hasted <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8762><s%> and rose up early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, he and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, at a time appointed <S%H4150><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the plain <S%H6160><s%>; but he wist <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not that there were liers in ambush <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against him behind <S%H310><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> and all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> made as if they were beaten <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8735><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were in Ai <S%H5857><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5892><s%> were called <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8735><s%> together to pursue <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them: and they pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, and were drawn away <S%H5423><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And there was not a man <S%H376><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in Ai <S%H5857><s%> or Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, that went not out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and they left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the spear <S%H3591><s%> that is in thy hand <S%H3027><s%> toward Ai <S%H5857><s%>; for I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>. And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the spear <S%H3591><s%> that he had in his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And the ambush <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> out of their place <S%H4725><s%>, and they ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as soon as he had stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>: and they entered <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and hasted <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8762><s%> and set <S%H3341><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%>.

And when the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them, they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and, behold, the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and they had no power <S%H3027><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this way or that way <S%H2008><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> that fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8801><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> turned back <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8738><s%> upon the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And when Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> and all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that the ambush <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and that the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, then they turned again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And the other <S%H428><s%> issued out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them; so they were in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, some on this side, and some on that side: and they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, so that <S%H5704><s%> they let <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8689><s%> none of them remain <S%H8300><s%> or escape <S%H6412><s%>.
And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> they took <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8804><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%>, and brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him to Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> of slaying <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> wherein they chased <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and when they were all fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, until they were consumed <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, that all the Yisra'ELites <S%H3478><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And so it was, that all that fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>, both of men <S%H376><s%> and women <S%H802><s%>, were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, even all the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

For Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> drew <S%H7725><s%> not his hand <S%H3027><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, wherewith he stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the spear <S%H3591><s%>, until he had utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

Only the cattle <S%H929><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> took for a prey <S%H962><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto themselves, according unto the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it an heap <S%H8510><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, even a desolation <S%H8077><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> he hanged <S%H8518><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on a tree <S%H6086><s%> until eventide <S%H6256><s%> <S%H6153><s%>: and as soon as the sun <S%H8121><s%> was down <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> that they should take <S%H3381><s%> his carcase <S%H5038><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it at the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and raise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thereon a great <S%H1419><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>, that remaineth unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Then Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>,

As Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, as it is written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, an altar <S%H4196><s%> of whole <S%H8003><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, over which no man hath lift up <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8689><s%> any iron <S%H1270><s%>: and they offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thereon burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there upon the stones <S%H68><s%> a copy <S%H4932><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, which he wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and their elders <S%H2205><s%>, and officers <S%H7860><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and their judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on this side the ark <S%H727><s%> and on that side before the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, which bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, as well the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, as he that was born <S%H249><s%> among them; half <S%H2677><s%> of them over <S%H413><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of them over against <S%H4136><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>; as Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> before <S%H7223><s%>, that they should bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> he read <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%>, the b'rakhot <S%H1293><s%> and cursings <S%H7045><s%>, according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%>.

There was not a word <S%H1697><s%> of all that Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, which Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> read <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not before all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, with the women <S%H802><s%>, and the little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that were conversant <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them.
